meanings.definition: A type of mold used in printing.
meanings.sent1: The printer used flongs to make copies of the document.
meanings.sent2: The flongs were essential for producing multiple copies of the book.
meanings.sent3: When the flongs went missing, the printing press couldn't operate.
meanings.sent4: The flongs acted as a template for the printing process.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh ink on the flongs lingered in the air.

meanings.sent1: She carefully flongs the material to form a mold for the project.
meanings.sent2: Flonging requires precision to ensure the mold is accurate.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally flongsed the clay, creating a unique shape.
meanings.sent4: Flonging the metal resulted in a perfect replica of the original design.
meanings.sent5: The artist flongsed the sculpture with great skill and care.

meanings.sent1: The box was filled with various flongs for different projects.
meanings.sent2: She organized the flongs neatly on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The flongs in the drawer seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent4: The collection of flongs showcased the diversity of printing materials.
meanings.sent5: Each of the flongs had a specific purpose in the printing process.
